10#ifndef VSIP_CORE_TEMP_BUFFER_HPP
11#define VSIP_CORE_TEMP_BUFFER_HPP
12
13/***********************************************************************
14  Included Files
15***********************************************************************/
16
17#include <utility>
18
19#include <vsip/support.hpp>
20#include <vsip/core/noncopyable.hpp>
21
22
23
24/***********************************************************************
25  Declarations
26***********************************************************************/
27
28namespace vsip
29{
30
31namespace impl
32{
33
34template <typename T>
35class Temp_buffer : Non_copyable
36{
37public:
38  Temp_buffer(std::ptrdiff_t size)
39    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
40    : data_ (0),
41      size_ (size)
42  {
43    is_alloc_ = false;
44    std::pair<T*, std::ptrdiff_t> p = std::get_temporary_buffer<T>(size_);
45
46    if (p.second == 0)
47    {
48      is_alloc_ = true;
49      data_     = new T[size_];
50    }
51    else if (p.second < size_)
52    {
53      std::return_temporary_buffer(p.first);
54      is_alloc_ = true;
55      data_     = new T[size_];
56    }
57    else
58    {
59      data_ = p.first;
60    }
61  }
62
63  ~Temp_buffer()
64    VSIP_NOTHROW
65  {
66    if (is_alloc_) 
67      delete[] data_;
68    else
69      std::return_temporary_buffer(data_);
70  }
71
72  T* data() const { return data_; }
73
74private:
75  T*		 data_;
76  std::ptrdiff_t size_;
77  bool           is_alloc_;
78};
79
80} // namespace vsip::impl
81} // namespace vsip
82
83#endif // VSIP_CORE_TEMP_BUFFER_HPP
